alert.note: Alert for Duval; McMullen (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Wind Chill Watch issued January 15 at 3:14PM CST until January 17 at 10:00AM CST by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM CST THIS EVENING... ...WIND CHILL WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 11 AM CST TUESDAY... ...WIND CHILL WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY EVENING THROUGH WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...For the first Wind Chill Warning, dangerously cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 10 above zero. For the Winter Weather Advisory, freezing rain. Additional ice accumulations of a light glaze. For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 15 degrees. For the second Wind Chill Warning, dangerously cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 5 above zero. For the Wind Chill Watch, dangerously cold wind chills possible. Wind chills as low as 10 above zero. * WHERE...McMullen. * WHEN...For the Wind Chill Advisory, until 10 PM CST this evening. For the Wind Chill Warning, from 10 PM this evening to 11 AM CST Tuesday. For the Wind Chill Watch, from Tuesday evening through Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...Very slippery sidewalks, roads and bridges are possible. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. The dangerously cold wind chills could result in hypothermia or frostbite if precautions are not taken.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
